data.taskTitle: user submits message /tasks > sessioncard and it hangs for about 1 minute then submits
data.approach: Investigate the Content-Length mismatch error in workSessions.fetchActivityStates and the session hanging issue when submitting /tasks command

summary: Investigated session submission hang issue in /tasks > sessioncard flow
Identified multiple console errors related to automation engine and session handling
Captured session logs and traced potential network response issues

suggestedTasks.title: Resolve Network Response Handling in Session Submission
suggestedTasks.description: Investigate and fix the TypeError causing Content-Length header mismatch in workSessions.fetchActivityStates. This appears to be blocking session submission and causing significant delays. Review network response parsing in workSessions.svelte.ts and implement proper error handling or response validation.
suggestedTasks.reason: Identified critical network response processing issue blocking task submission

suggestedTasks.title: Enhance Automation Engine Rule Matching
suggestedTasks.description: Debug why the automation engine is finding zero matching rules during session processing. Examine the rule matching logic in automationEngine.ts and ensure comprehensive coverage for different input scenarios.
suggestedTasks.reason: Inconsistent rule matching observed in session output processing

patterns: Automation engine rule matching requires review
gotchas: Content-Length header may exceed response body
Session submission can hang for extended periods

documentationNeeds: Update troubleshooting guide for session submission errors
